about.description: Learn more about the echelon bot and how it was made!

apex.description: Get apex stats for yourself or a homie

covid.description:
Retrieves us covid statistics from [the covid tracking project](https://covidtracking.com/)
`[state code]` is an optional field.

more-info.disclaimer: Information accuracy is subject on [the covid tracking project](https://covidtracking.com/)'s sources. Find out more [here](https://covidtracking.com/about-data/sources).

genius.description: Retrieve lyrics from genius for a song

more-info.important: If querying more than one word, (eg. Bon Iver) `[use brackets]`

help.description: Displays the available commands. `[command]` is an optional field.

lol.description: Get basic League of Legends stats for you or a homie

mystats.description: Bot-generated Discord chat statistics for user

serverstats.description: Vanilla and bot-generated Discord statistics for server

more-info.stored info:
`Total messages sent`
`Total bad words typed`
`Total commands typed`

votekick.description: Start a votekick for a member of the server.

more-info.disclaimer: This *will* actually kick the user, if granted the permissions to do so.
